patchNotes.title: Talent Rework

texts.text: Additional functionality: Quest: <modified, abilities, basic, 0> damage is increased by 1.5 every time it hits a Hero.

general.developerCommentary: This quest is fun. I am bringing it baseline to also help me better build my new Cassia.

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Cassia is on a strange place she usually fluctuate between extremely overpowered or weak and that lies on the fact she is one of the few assassins that has self-armor and a consistent one. My objective here is not to be conscious about that balancing creep but rather bring his <modified, abilities, basic, 2> more utility and give her more variety on builds to standard maps

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0> renamed to <modified, talents, 1, 0>

texts.text: <modified, abilities, basic, 2> now stuns the target for 0.75 seconds. If the target health is below 35% <modified, abilities, basic, 2> will deal additional damage 50% damage and grant Cassia protected while Channeling.

changes.developerCommentary: Bringing more variety to <modified, abilities, basic, 2>. This one is intended to be flexible to deal with mobile heroes and a finishing move.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 1, 1>

texts.text: <modified, abilities, basic, 2> heals 40% of the damage done the effect is double if the target is blinded. Increase <modified, abilities, basic, 2> area of effect by 25%

changes.developerCommentary: I am spreading healing focused talents between Cassia talent tree instead of focusing it on level 7. I think this one is a good option if you want to play safe

changes.name: <modified, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Increase <modified, abilities, basic, 2> cast range by 70%. Cassia now travels through terrain while charging
subtexts: If Cassia would stop at a terrain the travelling time will be increased until a valid position is found
The range goes from 6.0 to 10.2 | <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0, anduin> is 10

changes.developerCommentary: This is to elevate your psychopathy

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Moved to level 4

changes.developerCommentary: With this tree being focused on <modified, abilities, basic, 2> i am bringing it to the powerhouse tier

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: Moved from level 7

changes.developerCommentary: This is the strongest talent on Cassia talent tree usually the one that balances Cassia between weak or overpowered. I am bringing it here to make level 4 the powerhouse tier where you select your damage playstyle.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Moved from level 1
additional functionality: Each enemy hero hit reduces Cassia cooldowns by 0.3 seconds and restores 10 mana
subtexts: Only the bounce hits on enemy heroes will reduce Cassia cooldowns

changes.developerCommentary: This additional buff is to compete as one of the power house on an all around style.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Increase <modified, abilities, basic, 0>  damage by 25% while active

changes.developerCommentary: Making Inner Light receive that bonus damage to compete as the more defensive powerhouse option

texts.text: Moved to level 7

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 0> renamed to <modified, talents, 7, 0>

texts.text: After 0.75 a lightning javelin will struck the center of the affected area making enemey heroes disoriented for 1.5 seconds.
subtexts: Disoriented works similar to Gul'dan fear but will break the effect if the target takes damage after 0.5 of the effect starts.

changes.developerCommentary: It seems fun. I always first looking to make it as a thunder bolt but sadly Cassia is not Zeus. Disoriented comes from the ideas of the possible effects that a lightning effect could do on an rpg and i wanted to not make stuns and bolts can't make targets sleep.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: <modified, abilities, basic, 1> persists on the area for 1.5 seconds extending any blind duration. Passive: Increase the passive damage bonus of <modified, abilities, basic, 1> from 15% to 30%
subtexts: It will still apply the base blind
It will extend by stopping any blind status effect timer

changes.developerCommentary: I like the idea of making it also a zoning tool, the duration needs to be low just to prevent it to be more of a nuisance that it will alredy be.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 0>

texts.text: Moved from level 4.
Additional functionality: <modified, abilities, basic, 1> grants 20 shield for 3 seconds for every enemy hit this bonus is tripled if it's an hero up to 180.

changes.developerCommentary: Making the shield amounts low to balance with the base effect and also the passive armor but still making it effective to mitigate some damage.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> renamed to <modified, talents, 13, 0>

texts.text: <modified, abilities, basic, 2> now knocks back enemies at the end of its channel slowing them for 30% for 2 seconds and deal extra 6% of his maximum health damage if he is blinded.
subtexts: Knockback duration: 0.25 same <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0, lucio>
Knockback speed: 16.5 | same <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0, lucio>

changes.developerCommentary: There's not much to say besides i found that idea to be cool

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Armor reduced from 60 to 40
Moved from level 20

changes.developerCommentary: With the mix of <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> to <vanilla, talents, 1, 0> i am bringing it here to be the new defensive option as well i don't think this talent should belong to level 20 as it doesn't make the player feel powerful even tho it's a good talent.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: Moved to level 16

changes.developerCommentary: I want to make <modified, talents, 13, 1> the only talent about spacing on level 13

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: Moved from level 13
Changed functionality: Hitting enemy heroes with <modified, abilities, basic, 0>  empowers Cassia next basic attack with 3 extra range and extra 6% of their maximum health as damage.

changes.developerCommentary: This new effect is to bring more synergy between <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> between all level 16 talents while still retaining it's essence

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 2>

texts.text: Removed.

changes.developerCommentary: Remade it on the new <modified, talents, 16, 2>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: Basic attacks won't deal extra damage anymore
Additional functionality: Basic attacks against heroes empowers the next <modified, abilities, basic, 0>  increasing its speed and max range by 30%.

changes.developerCommentary: The current talent effect is good BUT doesn't feel good for a level 20. What i mean is that usually level 20 talents FEEL strong and different..this adjustament is to bring that FEELING.

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Receive all level 4 talents.

changes.developerCommentary: The sad thing about this talent is the description is short but the good thing is that this talent is absolutely nuts.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Moved to level 13.

changes.developerCommentary: Going to a more utility focused tier
